TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 可作為設計工具的基底類別，在 Visual Web 設計工具提供衍生自 抽象類別的控制項設計階段支援。

span.span: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Visual Web 設計工具中，當使用者從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，描述控制項的標記來源程式碼衍生自類別會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In the Visual Web Designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項將保存到標記來源的程式碼中，並編輯網頁的標記。When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 類別可做為基底類別衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援，在 Visual Web 設計工具的設計工具。The class serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the . 類別屬性會提供下列功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: - 屬性會傳回物件，其中通常包含物件衍生自繼承樹狀結構的設計工具中的每個層級的物件。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the object for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 並屬性可存取衍生自控制項的對應屬性類別。The and properties provide access to the corresponding properties of a control that is derived from the class. 和會指出記憶體提供文字分別值清單項目內容的資料來源的欄位。The and indicate the fields of the data source that provide the text and value content of the list items, respectively. 類別方法提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法繫結相關聯的控制項是衍生自設計階段資料來源。The method binds the associated control that is derived from the to a design-time data source. - 方法會傳回用來在設計階段呈現關聯的控制項的標記。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. - 方法會傳回設計階段元件從關聯的控制項容器。The method returns the design-time component from the associated control container. - 方法會傳回從控制項容器，解析為設計時間控制項的屬性。The method returns the from the control container, resolved to the design-time property of the control. - 方法準備設計工具，以檢視和設計關聯的控制項衍生自。The method prepares the designer to view and design the associated control that is derived from the . - 方法時，會呼叫關聯的控制項已變更。The method is called when the for the associated control has changed. - 方法來移除其他屬性，加入其他屬性，或遮蔽關聯控制項衍生自屬性。The method is used to remove additional properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated control that is derived from the . ## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。This section provides two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何衍生自訂的控制項設計工具。The first demonstrates how to derive a custom control designer. 第二個示範如何將衍生的控制項使用設計工具產生關聯。The second demonstrates how to associate a derived control with a designer. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為類別`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`繼承自類別。The following code example shows how to create a class named `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` that inherits from the class. `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別會覆寫， ，和方法。The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class overrides the , , and methods. `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別顯示`SimpleRadioButtonList`設計介面上的控制項。The `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class displays a `SimpleRadioButtonList` control on the design surface. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例衍生`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制項從控制項，並示範如何使用類別來建立關聯`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制項，其設計工具，使用`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別。The following code example derives the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control from the control, and shows how to use the class to associate the `SimpleRadioButtonList` control with its designer, the `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner` class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonList.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlist.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別建立關聯的控制項是衍生自時設計介面上的類別。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the class on the design surface.

summary.span: 繫結指定的控制項至設計階段資料來源。

span.span: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對基底類別方法會設定和的屬性物件的參考設計階段資料來源，然後呼叫方法，，然後再還原和為其原始值的屬性。For the base class, the method sets the and properties of the object to reference the design-time data source, then calls the method, and then restores the and properties to their original values. 針對類別，不過，方法會有任何功能，因為物件只是已加入至集合。For the class, however, the method has no functionality, because objects were just added to the collection.

span.span: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.
The of the list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會設定或擷取要用於設計階段表示控制項在執行階段的標記。The property sets or retrieves the markup to use for the design-time representation of the control at run time. 這會提供透過設計工具，以存取關聯的控制項，對應於提供清單項目的文字內容的資料來源欄位的屬性。This provides access via the designer to the property of the associated control, which corresponds to the field of the data source that provides the text content of the list items.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataValueField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataValueField : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的資料值欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.
The of the list control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可透過設計工具，以存取相關聯的控制項，表示提供值的清單項目內容的資料來源的欄位屬性。The property provides access via the designer to the property of the associated control, which indicates the field of the data source that provides the value content of the list items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來表示控制項的 HTML。

span.span: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.

returns.span: ，包含在設計階段用來呈現衍生自 之控制項的標記。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the control derived from the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果關聯的控制項衍生自物件是資料繫結方法可清除集合，並將訊息，表示控制項資料繫結。If the associated control derived from the object is data-bound, the method clears the collection and adds a message indicating the control is data-bound. 如果關聯的控制項不是資料繫結與集合是空的新增訊息，表示未繫結控制項。If the associated control is not data-bound and the collection is empty, the adds a message indicating the control is unbound. 然後，呼叫其基底方法，以產生標記。Then, the calls its base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫方法，以自訂相關聯的控制項在設計介面上顯示的標記。The following code example overrides the method to customize the markup that is displayed for the associated control on a design surface. 如果未定義屬性關聯的控制項，它會設定為`Gainsboro`，和控制項都會顯示該背景色彩。If the property is not defined for the associated control, it is set to `Gainsboro`, and the control is displayed with that background color. 這麼做，基底實作之後呼叫方法。After this is done, the base implementation of the method is called. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

param.name: component
param.span: 衍生自 的控制項，可實作 。

span.span: A control derived from the that implements an .

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法時就準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項衍生自類別。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the class. 方法和其基底方法設定屬性，並連接至 設計工具的運作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是衍生自控制項，，與這個設計工具相關聯，或該控制項的複本。The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the , that is associated with this designer or is a copy of that control. ## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫設計工具中的方法衍生自類別，以確保只有在控制項類別的執行個體名為`SimpleRadioButtonList`所使用的自訂設計工具。The following code example overrides the method in a designer derived from the class to ensure that only instances of a control class named `SimpleRadioButtonList` are used by the custom designer. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object source, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object source, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnComponentChanged (source As Object, ce As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public: override void OnComponentChanged(System::Object ^ source, System::ComponentModel::Design::ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ ce);

span.span: The source of the event.
The event data.
Raises the ComponentChanged event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理元件所做的變更。Handles changes made to the component. 這包括在屬性方格中所做的變更。This includes changes made in the property grid.

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接至目前的資料來源的物件，如果控制項已連接資料來源不同，更新設計階段標記。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the object to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup. 方法後連接到目前的資料來源的更新設計階段標記。The method updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source. ## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別。The following code example overrides the method in a class that inherits from the class. 當資料來源也就是與變更相關聯設計工具類別，方法呼叫，而且此程式碼會設定名為的變數`changedDataSource`至`true`。When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the method is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

This parameter is ignored.

summary.span: 當關聯控制項的資料來源已經變更時呼叫。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接類別目前的資料來源，如果控制項已連接資料來源不同，更新設計階段標記。The base method connects the associated control that is derived from the class to the current data source and, if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, updates the design-time markup. 後連接到目前的資料來源設計工具的方法無條件地將更新過的設計階段標記。The method of the designer unconditionally updates the design-time markup after connecting to the current data source. 值`forceUpdateView`會被忽略。The value of `forceUpdateView` is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫方法中的類別，繼承自類別。The following code example overrides the method in a class that inherits from the class. 當資料來源也就是與變更相關聯設計工具類別，呼叫，此程式碼會設定名為的變數`changedDataSource`到`true`。When the data source that is associated with the designer class changes, the is called and this code sets a variable named `changedDataSource` to `true`. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. para.span: 呼叫端應該使用公用覆寫。

span.span: Callers should use the public override.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，實作加入的或遮蔽的屬性之 ，以便在設計階段為關聯的控制項公開。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除其他屬性或加入屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至或從其中移除屬性的方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 控制項是衍生自物件，加入屬性設定為和關聯控制項的屬性。For controls that are derived from the object, the adds the attribute to the and properties of the associated control.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示關聯的控制項是否應該呈現其預設動作清單。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`false`，讓資料來源下拉式清單中不會顯示與**選擇資料來源**中的功能表項目**一般工作**操作功能表。The property returns `false` so that a data source dropdown is not displayed with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu. 相反地，此功能表項目會顯示**選擇資料來源** 對話方塊中，可讓使用者選取並和屬性。Instead, this menu item displays the **Choose Data Source** dialog box, which allows the user to select a and the and properties.

para.span: 覆寫屬性來傳回如果您想要的控制項衍生自類別，以顯示與資料來源下拉式清單中**選擇資料來源**中的功能表項目**一般工作**在設計階段的內容功能表。

span.span: Override the property to return if you want the control that is derived from the class to display a data source dropdown with the **Choose Data Source** menu item in the **Common Tasks** context menu at design time.
